resources.string: Tap the button below to enable or disable heads-up notifications.

Are you using MIUI? Before you can use this app, you'll probably need to give it some slack when it comes to security.
1. Go to System Settings > All > Apps > Downloaded > Heads-up notifications.
2. Toggle the switch that says 'Show popup windows' (second option).
3. At the bottom, go to 'Manage permissions'.
4. Set 'I trust this app' to on.
Like what you see? Check out my other apps as well:
Filter notifications based on their priority.\nRequires Android 4.1
Uncheck an app to mute it. You can also tap and hold on the X button in the heads-up to mute an app.
Check an app to keep heads-up from interfering while you\'re using it.
Display the heads-up on the lockscreen.
The service is enabled. Try sending yourself a message.\nIf it doesn\'t work, please reboot your device and try again.\nTap here if you need help
The service is running. Try sending yourself a message.\nTap here if you need help.
If the app has been misbehaving lately, tap here to report the problem. You don\'t have to do anything if the app is behaving normally.\n\n

string-array.name: priorityLevel
string-array.item: Critical and urgent (missed calls, directions, emergency alerts)
Contextual and background info (weather, expired events, suggestions)

resources.string: Turn the screen on when you get a notification
Keep notifications on the lockscreen until you dismiss them
Remove notifications from the drawer when you swipe them away. You can still tap the X to dismiss from the drawer.
Use L\'s round icons instead of the squared icons from earlier releases
Don\'t turn the screen on if the phone is in a pocket or facedown on a table.
Don\'t display heads-up for notifications from the current app
Display song metadata on track change.\nNote: not all music players are supported.
Both the notification listener and the accessibility service is enabled. Please disable one of them.
Select \'Heads-up notifications\' to toggle the service
Long-tap the icon to open the notification as a floating window. Experimental feature, works with OmniRom and XHaloFloatingWindow.
Hide the dismiss button from the notifications
Automatically unlock the phone when you open a notification.\nWARNING! This will allow ANYONE to unlock your phone, regardless of your security settings.
Only display the first line of the notification.
Fine-tune the font size in the popups
Only display popups on the lockscreen.
Don\'t display message contents on the lockscreen
Enable this service to allow Heads-up to read your notifications.\n\nDO NOT enable this service if your device is running Android 4.3 or newer.
After disabling this service, some features in Heads-up might not work properly.
Enabling this will allow Heads-up to turn off your screen. Use this if the screen doesn\'t turn off after displaying popups on the lockscreen, or if the pocket detection doesn\'t work properly.
No proximity sensor detected. Pocket detection will not work. Please DON\'T report this bug.
After turning the screen on, keep it on as long as the heads-up is visible.
